start.welcome_back:
Welcome back!
(to change the language type /language)
start.language: You didn't select the language of the questions, choose the language on the inline keyboard
start.desc:
Darts bot.
Here you can play darts with various questions.
To start choose the question's language

question.question:
Question create
Other players will be able to play darts with your questions.
At the first game you'll see your question first

To create a question just write it and send a message
question.created: Question successfully created! You can play or create one more.
